What version of eclipse are you using?  I can't reconcile the line numbers in
that stack trace to the associated method names in the 3.0 release version.

Also, the root stack trace (the NullPointerException) looks suspicious.  Could
you please post the entire stack trace?

I am going to mark this as WORKSFORME as it looks like an issue with an NPE in 
the actions. Please reopen if you have more details.
